faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about Vitema

1.question: How can I start using Vitema?
1.answer: We are currently collecting a list of interested people to adapt the system to market needs. Subscribe to the newsletter, and we will inform you about the platform launch and give you access to the beta version with additional benefits for early adopters.

2.question: Can I customize the system to my brand?
2.answer: Yes, Vitema will offer white-label capabilities, meaning you can customize the system's appearance to your brand - including logo, colors, and domain.

3.question: Will the system work on mobile devices?
3.answer: Yes, Vitema is designed with responsiveness in mind. Both the dietitian panel and the client interface will be fully functional on all devices - computers, tablets, and phones.

4.question: What technical support will be available?
4.answer: We plan to provide comprehensive technical support via chat, email, and a knowledge base with tutorials. For larger clients, we anticipate dedicated support and training.

5.question: Will it be possible to import data from other systems?
5.answer: Yes, we plan to feature data import for clients and diets from popular formats (CSV, Excel) and integrations with the most popular diet management systems.

6.question: How about data security?
6.answer: Data security is our priority. The system will be GDPR compliant, and data will be encrypted and stored on secure servers in the EU. We will not have access to sensitive data of dietitians and their clients.

7.question: What makes Vitema stand out from the competition?
7.answer: Vitema stands out by using the latest technologies in both the dietitian panel and the client app. The entire system is optimized for performance, ensuring smooth operation without freezing or crashes, even under heavy load.
